strings.HOWTO_CONTENT_ID:
Orient the device
to move the ball.

Tap on the screen
to make the ball jump.

Avoid all hazards
and collect Orbs
to refill your energy.

Collect power-ups to increase
your chance to survive

Good Luck!
strings.SOCIAL_SCORE_MSG_ID: I had a new high score at beFall :
strings.TUTO_STEP_1:
Orient the device
   to move the ball.
strings.TUTO_STEP_2:
You can make the ball jump
   by taping on your screen.
strings.TUTO_STEP_3:
Avoid all hazards
and collect Orbs
 to refill your energy.
